text: tittamaka nam umakku munnar tutarkalai anuppiyirukkinrom; avarkalil cilarutaiya varalarrai umakkuk kuriyullom; innum evarkalutaiya varalarrai umakkuk kuravillaiyo (avarkalum) attutarkalil irukkinranar (ivvirucararil) entat tutarum allahvin anumatiyinri enta attatciyaiyum kontu varuvatarku (atikaramum) illai akave allahvutaiya kattalaivarum potu, (anaivarukkum) niyayamakat tirppalikkappatum; anriyum, anta itattil poyyarkal tam nastamataivarkal
